title: FSIS Issues Public Health Alert for Poultry Products Produced Without Benefit of Import Inspection
summary: WASHINGTON, Nov. 20, 2017 - The U.S. Department of Agriculture's Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) is issuing a public health alert to inform consumers that approximately 6,907 pounds of chicken products produced by Productos Dany, Inc., a Hatillo P.R. establishment, may contain products that...

establishment.name: Productos Dany Inc.
establishment.address:
Road 129 km 13.8 Barrio Bayaney 
  Hatillo, PR 659

impacted_products: 6.72-lb. plastic wrapped cases containing 24-count of individually wrapped Productos Dany Inc., Cheese Dog with lot code(s) 302, 303, 304, 305, 306, 309 or 310.
9.10-lb. plastic wrapped cases containing 24-count of individually wrapped Productos Dany Inc. Doggie Pizza with lot code(s) 302, 304, 305, 306, 309 or 310.
